page.title: 13LIFE 2
page.content: {A Day in the life of Mrs. Bennett {continued.} Part 2 At School. When she gets to school she starts to make the school dinner. In the afternoon, after she has served the dinner, she does the washing up with her friends. (The other dinner ladies.) She then goes home and does some more odd jobs around the house. Later on she goes back to school to clean it. In the evening she helps her husband and her daughter works with her also. She gets about 6 to 8 hours sleep and gets up at about 10 to 8 in the morning. Mrs. Bennett has worked as a cook for 25 years by this September. She never wants to move from Lydd Green, because she hates busy towns.
